Content: For a few weeks it went downhill, asking for a monthly fee, playing music in the background. These particular things have not bothered me in about a month or so; so they must have changed some things back after poor reviews. This is my favorite app and whereas I understand certain features should be paid for I appreciate the changes made.
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
